name: Tiny Force Deluxe (itch)
description:
Tiny Force Deluxe

Tiny Force Deluxe is a turn-based battle game to free the world from evil forces.

Create your own Tiny Force team and go to the fight. Evolve your characters with the magical crystals to make them stronger, faster and more resilient.

Each character has a special attack ability, play with various characters like Robots, Ninjas, Dragons, Vikings, Zombies and more.

CAMPAIGN | Advance through the various game worlds, each with their specific enemies and bosses. Build your best team and beat the enemies.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER | Play online with your friends and unlock unique special characters in this mode.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER | Play locally with another player with your unlocked characters.

IN GAME:
- Build the best team to defeat your opponents and level up;
- Five different worlds to fight through and win the game;
- Thirty unlockable characters, of different types and skills,  such as Forest Counter, Fire Slice, Dark Beam monsters and more;
- Destroy crystals and acquire jewels so your characters can evolve;
- Excellent character and scenario artwork;
- Several items to improve your gaming experience;
- Bonus stages to get Energies, Ultras, Lives, and much more.
- Amazing boss battles;
- When you finish a challenge, you will get your Rewards.
